scripts.build:public: bun run sync:sprites && bun build src/main.ts --outfile public/main.js --target browser && cp index.html public/index.html && mkdir -p public/styles && cp styles/main.css public/styles/main.css && cp styles/ios-theme.css public/styles/ios-theme.css
scripts.build:pages: bun run sync:sprites && rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs/styles && bun build src/main.ts --outfile docs/main.js --target browser && cp index.html docs/index.html && cp styles/main.css docs/styles/main.css && cp styles/ios-theme.css docs/styles/ios-theme.css && cp -R public/assets docs/assets && cp -R public/vibimon-assets docs/vibimon-assets && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.server: bun run build:public && bun run src/server.ts
